entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then rain mixed with snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 12.
